channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘It’s a major flaw’: AirPods 3 Pro owners are still waiting for Apple to fix its annoying static problems — and users are getting impatient
item.description: Angry Reddit users are impatiently waiting for Apple to fix the AirPods Pro 3's static problems, but the company has been silent.

item.title: Apple Watch users in Australia can soon start taking advantage of hypertension notifications
item.description: Apple Watches from the series 9 onwards now have approval to be used as medical devices to monitor blood pressure, and it could prove to be another life-saving feature.

item.title: I tried the new Claude in Chrome extension, and it delivered convenience with a side of digital paranoia
item.description: Claude’s Chrome extension is a powerful productivity tool that handles browser-based tasks for you, but it comes at the cost of significant access to your digital life.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for December 20, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for December 20, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for December 20, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for December 20, 2025
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for December 20, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1644 on December 20 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: Sequoia partner spreads debunked Brown shooting theory, testing new leadership
item.description: The newest episode raises questions about whether Sequoia's new leadership -- managing partners Alfred Lin and Pat Grady, who took over last month -- can or will rein in Maguire's social media activity.
